catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 812
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: hexagonal bronze container on round base; hexagonal cover with stepped dome; spire with three disks; tiny dragons on each hexagonal point
signed: shallowly etched on side: Fifteenth day of the tenth month, the second year of the Taiji era (1127)
text: This sutra container can be dated to the year 1127 thanks to an inscription incised on the body of the container. Its lid is decorated with delicate bird motifs.
title: Hexagonal Sutra Container
